description: The attack took place on the German capital's Museum Island and took over two weeks to come to light.
title: Berlin mystery attack targets 70 museum artefacts
title_page: Berlin mystery attack targets 70 museum artefacts - BBC News
maintext: The reason for the initial secrecy is unclear, and the story was only confirmed after police were approached by Die Zeit magazine and Deutschlandfunk radio. Other museums were not informed of the possible risk either, they report.
